name: Life During Wartime
description:
Life During Wartime

A game by @moderngravel

A day in the life of Vanessa, Sara, and Jonson: three friends struggling to find a place they belong in a dystopian America.

Controls:
Move - W A S D
Next/Interact - K

In part inspired by the song of the same name by David Byrne, but not really.

This is my first game jam, hopefully of many.
#AdvJam2016

Music is available on my bandcamp.
